data.name: Coronation
data.detailed_description:
Official Website


About the Game


Coronation is developed by Twin Sword Studio with the help of lovely Patreons and a closely-knitted Discord community. It is inspired by Mount & Blade Bannerlord, Rust, Sims 3/4, Runescape, Anno 1404 and Tropico 6.



  • Multiplayer open-world
Find a good location in the world to establish your lovely castle home in the harsh world with or without friends, or even make new friends and complete main story quests.

  • Decorate and furnish your interiors
There is a wide variety of functional furniture that you can decorate your interiors, and your people can use some of the furniture too!

  • Your own personal workforce and army
As the head of the castle, you can manage the jobs that your people do for you! Gather resources required to build your castle, or make lots of money with other jobs. Villagers can also level up and become stronger.

  • Defend your castle or attack enemies
You'll need to protect your people and property. There will be enemies every night depending on your location. Train a formidable army and equip them with powerful weapons!

  • Visit other players' creations
Since it's a multiplayer game, you can visit and explore the world for beautiful creations built by other players, or build your own and ask others to visit you at your castle.

data.short_description: A multiplayer castle builder game where you can build beautiful castles with royal halls, hire villagers to work in medieval jobs, or pillage other players' castles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 3.3 GHz (AMD FX 8300, Intel i5 3000)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated GPU, 2GB dedicated VRAM (Radeon RX 560, Geforce GTX 1050)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 4 GHz (AMD Ryzen 5 3600, Intel i5 8600)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated GPU, 4GB dedicated VRAM (Radeon RX 580, Geforce GTX 1080)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
